data.title: List of American films of 2011
data.text:
This is a list of American films released in 2011.

The highest-grossing American films released in 2011, by domestic box office gross revenue, are as follows:[1]

Highest-grossing films of 2011 Rank Title Distributor Domestic gross 1 Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows – Part 2 Warner Bros. $381,011,219 2 Transformers: Dark of the Moon Paramount $352,390,543 3 The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn – Part 1 Summit Entertainment $281,287,133 4 The Hangover Part II Warner Bros. $254,464,305 5 Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides Disney $241,071,802 6 Fast Five Universal $209,837,675 7 Mission: Impossible – Ghost Protocol Paramount $209,397,903 8 Cars 2 Disney $191,452,396 9 Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows Warner Bros. $186,848,418 10 Thor Paramount $181,030,624
